title: American Cultural Regions
intro: There are a number of regions that people talk about in the United States. We're interested in where you believe some of these regions are. We are going to ask you to draw a few (4) of these regions on a map to help us understand where you believe these areas are. There are no right or wrong answers; we are interested in specifically you think these areas are. We will then ask you to listen to a few (3) samples of speech from these different regions and answer two quick questions about each. We anticipate that this should only take you at most a few (between 5 and 10) minutes.

activities.title: About you
activities.helpText: Before we begin, we'd like to know a little bit more about you. Please tell us more about yourself by answering the following questions.

questions.question: What is the highest level of school you have completed?
What state do you currently live in?
If someone asked you what state you grew up in, and you had to choose only one state, what state would you say?

activities.title: American Geographic Regions
activities.helpText: We will now ask you to draw some areas on the map. If you click the region name in the side panel, you can draw that area on the map. If you click the name again, you can re-draw the region. When you are done, please click the Submit button.

activities.title: Some American Voices
activities.helpText: Listen to the following audio clips and answer some questions about them.

questions.question: If you were asked, could you guess where they came from? If so, where do you think they came from?

activities.title: Survey complete!
activities.helpText: Please take a moment and provide any feedback you have about this interface. Was it difficult or easy to use? Thank you!
